classification.task_goal: Generate detailed prompts for visual representations of world landmarks on a map.
primary_constraints: Provide visual detailed and creative descriptions
Use high terms and concentrate on visual aspects
Include known tweaks for image generation
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially provided prompts that did not fully adhere to the specified constraints regarding length and detail. However, the user repeated their request with additional emphasis on the requirements, prompting the assistant to adjust its responses accordingly, thus repairing the constraints.
